title: Please help me identify the name of this font
author: YASSA2067

comments.content: It could be based on **[Trade Marker (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829142402/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=FontShop&ffam=TradeMarker%20-%20Bold&fid=4d218b3c33542a69aa158a5886bc4807&fsize=60&text=alpina&fit=1)** [FontFont, 1999]
